original: @26b * // dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: @26b * // dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the glorious Vajravidāraṇa.

original: 'phags pa rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i dpa' bo gcig pa'i dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur bar 'dod pa'i sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas sa'i cho ga la sogs pa sngon du song bas /
analyzed: 'phags pa rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa'i dpa' bo gcig pa'i dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur bar 'dod pa'i sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan pas sa'i cho ga la sogs pa sngon du song bas /
translated: The practitioner who possesses the commitments and wishes to be initiated into the single hero maṇḍala of the noble Vajravidāraṇa should perform the earth ritual and so forth beforehand.

original: sa stegs gru gsum me long gi ngos ltar byas la /
analyzed: sa stegs gru gsum me long gi ngos ltar byas la /
translated: Make the earth platform triangular like the surface of a mirror.

original: thig gdab ste dbus ste ba mu khyud kyis bskor la lte ba ljang gu mu khyud dmar po sna tshogs padmas bskor /
analyzed: thig gdab ste dbus ste ba mu khyud kyis bskor la lte ba ljang gu mu khyud dmar po sna tshogs padmas bskor /
translated: Lay out the lines, and in the center, surround it with a rim. Make the center green, the rim red, and surround it with a multicolored lotus.

original: gru chad ljang gu bar khyams gnyis pa dkar ser sgo dang sgo khyud du bcas pa bris la /
analyzed: gru chad ljang gu bar khyams gnyis pa dkar ser sgo dang sgo khyud du bcas pa bris la /
translated: Make the corners green, the second courtyard white and yellow, and draw it with doors and door arches.🔽In a vase that possesses the characteristics, draw a vajra cross with gaurī lacquer, and in the vase for all activities, draw a multicolored vajra cross with minium and place it in the north.

original: mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i bum pa la gi wang gis mtshan ma rdo rje rgya gram phyogs gcig med pa btab la las thams cad pa'i bum pa la sku dkar gyis sna tshogs rdo rje bris la byang du bzhag / p'u dza ji ltar 'byor pa dang ba
analyzed: mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i bum pa la gi wang gis mtshan ma rdo rje rgya gram phyogs gcig med pa btab la las thams cad pa'i bum pa la sku dkar gyis sna tshogs rdo rje bris la byang du bzhag / p'u dza ji ltar 'byor pa dang ba
translated: Arrange whatever offerings are available and the torma in the four directions.

original: lim bsham / lag pa gnyis rdo rje bcings la mthe bong bsgrengs la srin lag sbyar te mdzub mo phyis nas /
analyzed: lim bsham / lag pa gnyis rdo rje bcings la mthe bong bsgrengs la srin lag sbyar te mdzub mo phyis nas /
translated: Make a fist with both hands, raise the thumbs, and join the ring fingers.

original: nas gang gis ma reg pa byas la mthe'u chung blang la /🔽aom badzra dzva l'a na l'a ya h'um phat /🔽ces pa brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pa'i bum pa'i nang du pam dang mam las padma nyi ma brtsegs pa'i steng du h'um las rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa sku mdog ljang ser phyag gnyis kyis gser gyi bum pa rdo rje rgya gram phyogs gcig med pas kha bcad
analyzed: nas gang gis ma reg pa byas la mthe'u chung blang la / aom badzra dzva l'a na l'a ya h'um phat / ces pa brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pa'i bum pa'i nang du pam dang mam las padma nyi ma brtsegs pa'i steng du h'um las rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa sku mdog ljang ser phyag gnyis kyis gser gyi bum pa rdo rje rgya gram phyogs gcig med pas kha bcad
translated: Then, without touching the thumbs, take the little fingers.🔽  Recite the mantra oṃ vajra jvālānalāya hūṃ phaṭ one hundred and eight times.

original: pa / thugs kar 'dzin pa /
analyzed: pa / thugs kar 'dzin pa /
translated: In the vase, which is the seat of the stacked lotus and sun from paṃ and maṃ, is a yellow vajra from hūṃ, which becomes the yellow-green form of Vajravidāraṇa. He holds a golden vase with a vajra cross with one prong extended at his heart.

original: sku la rin po che'i rgyan sna tshogs pas brgyan pa /
analyzed: sku la rin po che'i rgyan sna tshogs pas brgyan pa /
translated: He is adorned with various precious ornaments.

original: dbu la rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas kyis brgyan pa /
analyzed: dbu la rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas kyis brgyan pa /
translated: His head is adorned with the buddhas of the five families.

original: zhal yid tsam khro ba yan lag sprul rigs bzhis brgyan pa bskyed do //
analyzed: zhal yid tsam khro ba yan lag sprul rigs bzhis brgyan pa bskyed do //
translated: His face is slightly wrathful and his limbs are adorned with the four types of nāgas.

original: de'i thugs ka'i h'um las 'od 'phros pas don gnyis byas nas /
analyzed: de'i thugs ka'i h'um las 'od 'phros pas don gnyis byas nas /
translated: Light shines from the hūṃ in his heart, performs the two benefits, and returns.

original: aom badzra dzny'a na h'um sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom badzra dzny'a na h'um sv'a h'a /
translated: Oṃ vajra jñāna hūṃ svāhā.

original: h'um zhes brjod pas ye shes sems dpa' 'dra ba zla ba'i gdan la bskyed la de nyid la mchod pa dang gtor ma bya'o //
analyzed: h'um zhes brjod pas ye shes sems dpa' 'dra ba zla ba'i gdan la bskyed la de nyid la mchod pa dang gtor ma bya'o //
translated: Saying hūṃ, one should generate the gnosis being, similar to oneself, on a moon seat and make offerings and a bali to it.

original: de'i thugs ka'i h'um la dmigs te /
analyzed: de'i thugs ka'i h'um la dmigs te /
translated: Focusing on the hūṃ in its heart,

original: bdag nyid khrus bya ba dang / gos brje pa la sogs pa bya ste /
analyzed: bdag nyid khrus bya ba dang / gos brje pa la sogs pa bya ste /
translated: one should perform the ablutions, change of clothes, and so forth.

original: snying po brgya rtsa brgyad /
analyzed: snying po brgya rtsa brgyad /
translated: Recite the essence mantra one hundred and eight times,

original: bsdus pa la stong phrag gcig / shin tu bsdus pa la stong phrag bzlas te /
analyzed: bsdus pa la stong phrag gcig / shin tu bsdus pa la stong phrag bzlas te /
translated: the concise one one thousand times, and the very concise one one thousand times.

original: slob ma la srung skud gdags pa dang / dam tshig dang sdom pa 'bogs pa la sogs pa bya ste /
analyzed: slob ma la srung skud gdags pa dang / dam tshig dang sdom pa 'bogs pa la sogs pa bya ste /
translated: Tie a protection cord to the disciple, confer the sacred pledges and vows, and so forth.🔽Admit them into the maṇḍala and have them recite the dhāraṇī twenty-one times.

original: dkyil 'khor du gzhug / gzungs nyi shu rtsa gcig bklag tu gzhug / de nas lha ngo bstan /
analyzed: dkyil 'khor du gzhug / gzungs nyi shu rtsa gcig bklag tu gzhug / de nas lha ngo bstan /
translated: Then, reveal the deity’s form.

original: dbugs dbyung / gzengs bstod /
analyzed: dbugs dbyung / gzengs bstod /
translated: Give relief, praise,🔽and confer empowerment.

original: dbang bskur / lag @27a * //
analyzed: dbang bskur / lag @27a * //
translated: In the hand🔽of the disciple, who is circumambulating the maṇḍala,

original: tu rdo rje dang dril bu'i sgras dkyil 'khor bskor /
analyzed: tu rdo rje dang dril bu'i sgras dkyil 'khor bskor /
translated: place the vajra and the bell.

original: dbang rdzogs par byin la gos brje /
analyzed: dbang rdzogs par byin la gos brje /
translated: Having given the complete empowerment, change the disciple’s clothes.

original: zas kyi rnal 'byor bya'o //
analyzed: zas kyi rnal 'byor bya'o //
translated: Perform the yoga of eating.

original: de yang mchod pa dbul ba dang / gtor ma btang /
analyzed: de yang mchod pa dbul ba dang / gtor ma btang /
translated: Furthermore, make offerings, give torma,

original: dkyil 'khor bsdu /
analyzed: dkyil 'khor bsdu /
translated: dissolve the mandala,

original: bkra shis gsol /
analyzed: bkra shis gsol /
translated: recite auspicious verses,

original: slob ma la chos bshad /
analyzed: slob ma la chos bshad /
translated: explain the dharma to the disciples,

original: slob mas bla ma la yon dbul /
analyzed: slob mas bla ma la yon dbul /
translated: the disciples offer gifts to the guru,

original: bden pa'i tshig brjod do //
analyzed: bden pa'i tshig brjod do //
translated: and utter words of truth.

original: dpa' bo gcig pa'i dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba'i bdud rtsi bum pa'i cho ga dpal mar me mdzad kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so//
analyzed: dpa' bo gcig pa'i dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba'i bdud rtsi bum pa'i cho ga dpal mar me mdzad kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so//
translated: The ritual of the vase of elixir for conferring empowerment into the mandala of the sole hero composed by Śrī Dīpaṃkara is complete.
